template.en:
Continue the following story, which is delimited with triple backticks. Generate three different continuations. Continuations should address the viewpoint of the main character and their allies, who take a ::tone:: attitude. The tone in the development of events should be ::tone::. Continuations should use no more than 1 short sentence. 

Format each continuation as a JSON object with 'title' and 'continuation' as the keys. Format your response as a JSON object with 'cont1', 'cont2' and 'cont3' as the keys. 

Story: ```::before::```
